com.justai.zenbox.sdk.listener

Interface VoiceTriggerListener


  • public interface VoiceTriggerListener
    The VoiceTriggerListener interface provides methods for managing the lifecycle of VoiceTrigger. These methods will be invoked by VoiceTrigger service on the main thread of your application.
    See Also:
    VoiceTrigger

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onVoiceTriggerDetected(java.lang.String phrase)
      Called when VoiceTrigger has detected the voice trigger phrase.
      void onVoiceTriggerStarted()
      Called when VoiceTrigger starts to listen the user's speech.
      void onVoiceTriggerStopped()
      Called when VoiceTrigger stops to listen the user's speech.

    • Method Detail

      • onVoiceTriggerStarted

        void onVoiceTriggerStarted()
        Called when VoiceTrigger starts to listen the user's speech. Note that microphone will be blocked in this case and cannot be used until the VoiceTrigger stops.

      • onVoiceTriggerDetected

        void onVoiceTriggerDetected(java.lang.String phrase)
        Called when VoiceTrigger has detected the voice trigger phrase. The VoiceTrigger releases a microphone automatically before calling of this method.
        Parameters:
        phrase - the trigger phrase being detected

      • onVoiceTriggerStopped

        void onVoiceTriggerStopped()
        Called when VoiceTrigger stops to listen the user's speech. The microphone is released in this case and can be re-used by any other service.
